audioText: Ce film était vraiment génial ! J'ai adoré l'histoire et les acteurs.
question: What did the speaker think of the movie?
options: It was really great - they loved the story and actors
It was boring and they fell asleep during it
It was too long and the plot was confusing
It was okay but nothing special or memorable
explanation: The text states 'Ce film était vraiment génial ! J'ai adoré l'histoire et les acteurs' - This movie was really great! I loved the story and the actors. 'Génial' means great/awesome/brilliant (informal), and 'adoré' means loved.
